titleInfo.title: Bell Tower and a Day Moon

mods.abstract: The Bell Tower, originally constructed in 1958, was sponsored by the CBC Mothers' Club. Its dedication read: "A memorial to all the deceased mothers of Christian Brothers' students by the Mothers' Club. 1956-57 Mrs. John Gallina, President, 1957-58, Mrs. A. T. Hicks, President."

name.namePart: Brother Lambert Thomas Matthews, Bell Tower original design
